item.description:
@zech2005007 wrote:

[quote=“skiller noob1, post:16, topic:219780”][quote author=zech2005007 link=topic=288671.msg2400641#msg2400641 date=1219429349]
you got to add a command to tele you to the fun pk zone, or a portal or a teleport.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2008, 12:36:03 pm[/size][hr]i added it and it compiled fine, but when i went to the place it still said safe… and i couldn’t attack anyone
[/quote]
Then you need to make the coords into a dangerous part of the wild[/quote]

ah i see, thanks

you changed the coordinates in public boolean funPk() { if(absX >= 2125 && absX<= 2139 && absY >= 3143 && absY <=3162) return true; else return false; }

item.title: Fun Pk
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

oh wait. replace your public void youdied() with this:

public void youdied() { for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } if(funPk()) { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; heightLevel = 0; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(!funPk()) { for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) { try { if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) { //createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); //createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]); deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]); } } catch(Exception e) { } } removeAllItems(); for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) { try { if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) { //createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); //createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]); deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]); } } catch(Exception e) { } } } deleteItem(6570, getItemSlot(6570), 1); removeAllItems(); teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; heightLevel = 0; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

just change the XXXX’s and the YYYY’s to the coordinates of where you want them to go when they die…my bad i forgot that

Read full topic
